filmography.title: The Village Squire
filmography.role_description: A Hollywood star returning to her English village who charms the new squire; Leigh's film debut.
filmography.plot: A village's amateur production of Macbeth is threatened by the arrival of a strict new squire, until the leading lady intervenes.

filmography.title: Things Are Looking Up
filmography.role_description: A minor, uncredited role as a schoolgirl in this musical comedy.
filmography.plot: A strict teacher elopes with a wrestler, leaving her sister to impersonate her at the school to save her job.

filmography.title: Look Up and Laugh
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a shop owner who supports her father in a battle against a large department store.
filmography.plot: A market stall owner fights to save his business from a ruthless department store chain.

filmography.title: Gentlemen's Agreement
filmography.role_description: An unemployed typist who finds herself involved in a medical scheme.
filmography.plot: A young doctor sets up a practice in a village and uncovers a quack's scheme.

filmography.title: Fire Over England
filmography.role_description: A lady-in-waiting to Queen Elizabeth I who falls in love with a naval officer, marking her first on-screen pairing with future husband Laurence Olivier.
filmography.plot: A British naval officer spies on the Spanish Armada for Queen Elizabeth I.

filmography.title: Dark Journey
filmography.role_description: A Swiss dress shop owner who is secretly a double agent during World War I, falling in love with her German counterpart.
filmography.plot: During World War I, a French spy and a German spy fall in love in neutral Stockholm.

filmography.title: Storm in a Teacup
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a pompous politician who sides with a young reporter against her father in a dispute over a dog license.
filmography.plot: A reporter writes an article attacking a local politician for his harsh treatment of a woman who couldn't pay her dog's license fee.

filmography.title: A Yank at Oxford
filmography.role_description: A flirtatious, unhappy housewife who creates trouble for the students at Oxford University.
filmography.plot: A cocky American athlete receives a scholarship to Oxford University and clashes with the British students and traditions.

filmography.title: Sidewalks of London
filmography.role_description: A talented Cockney street busker who rises to become a theater star, leaving behind the man who discovered her.
filmography.plot: A street performer takes a young pickpocket under his wing and helps her become a star, only to be left behind as she rises to fame.

filmography.title: Gone with the Wind
filmography.role_description: A headstrong Southern belle who survives the Civil War and Reconstruction through sheer determination and ruthlessness.
filmography.plot: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Actress; NYFCC: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: 21 Days
filmography.role_description: A woman who falls in love with a man who has accidentally killed her husband, spending three idyllic weeks with him before justice calls.
filmography.plot: A man accidentally kills his lover's husband and lets an innocent man take the blame, but his conscience begins to weigh on him.

filmography.title: Waterloo Bridge
filmography.role_description: A ballerina who falls into poverty and prostitution after believing her soldier fiancé has been killed in WWI.
filmography.plot: A ballet dancer and an army officer fall in love during an air raid, but the war tears them apart with tragic consequences.

filmography.title: That Hamilton Woman
filmography.role_description: The beautiful and scandalous mistress of Lord Horatio Nelson during the Napoleonic Wars.
filmography.plot: The story of the romance between Lord Admiral Nelson and Lady Emma Hamilton.

filmography.title: Caesar and Cleopatra
filmography.role_description: The young Queen of Egypt who matures from a frightened girl into a powerful ruler under the tutelage of Julius Caesar.
filmography.plot: Julius Caesar conquers Egypt and takes the young Cleopatra under his wing to train her as a ruler.
filmography.awards: Most Expensive British Film of its Time

filmography.title: Anna Karenina
filmography.role_description: The tragic Russian aristocrat who sacrifices her marriage, son, and social standing for a passionate affair with Count Vronsky.
filmography.plot: A married aristocrat enters a passionate but destructive affair with a military officer.

filmography.title: A Streetcar Named Desire
filmography.role_description: A fading Southern belle with a fragile mental state who moves in with her sister and brutal brother-in-law in New Orleans.
filmography.plot: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Actress; BAFTA: Win – Best British Actress; Venice Film Festival: Win – Volpi Cup

filmography.title: The Deep Blue Sea
filmography.role_description: A woman who leaves her passionless marriage to a judge for a tumultuous affair with a younger ex-RAF pilot.
filmography.plot: A woman attempts suicide after leaving her husband for a younger man, forcing her to confront the emptiness of her life.

filmography.title: The Roman Spring of Mrs. Stone
filmography.role_description: An aging American actress who drifts into a life of aimlessness and gigolos in Rome after her husband's death.
filmography.plot: A widowed actress in Rome begins a romance with a young Italian gigolo, leading to humiliation and despair.

filmography.title: Ship of Fools
filmography.role_description: A faded, cynical divorcée traveling by ocean liner to pre-WWII Germany who tries to maintain her illusions of youth.
filmography.plot: A diverse group of passengers on a ship from Mexico to Germany in 1933 grapple with their personal demons and the rising tide of fascism.
filmography.awards: L'Étoile de Cristal: Win – Best Foreign Actress
